Package org.apache.kafka.common.security.auth

Interface KafkaPrincipalBuilder


  • public interface KafkaPrincipalBuilder
    Pluggable principal builder interface which supports both SSL authentication through SslAuthenticationContext and SASL through SaslAuthenticationContext. Note that the Configurable and Closeable interfaces are respected if implemented. Additionally, implementations must provide a default no-arg constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      KafkaPrincipal build​(AuthenticationContext context)
      Build a kafka principal from the authentication context.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        KafkaPrincipal build​(AuthenticationContext context)
        Build a kafka principal from the authentication context.
        Parameters:
        context - The authentication context (either SslAuthenticationContext or SaslAuthenticationContext)
        Returns:
        The built principal which may provide additional enrichment through a subclass of KafkaPrincipalBuilder.
